column4: Hello, the process "init" on my ubuntu computer is using 96-100% CPU, is there any way to lower this? (Tried rebooting)
init most likely has many subprocesses under it, finding the one eating your cpu might give a clue
you could try top or htop at the command or if you can get a process monitor open in the gui
None of the other processes are using much CPU (mostly 0%)
